title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 483.8 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 483.8 - Fees

State Regulations

Except where fees or exemptions from fees have been
established by law, rule, or regulation, the following fees shall apply: (a) The fee for copies of records shall be 25
cents per page for photographic copies not exceeding 81/2 by 14 inches in size, except for records that make up all or any part of an accident or investigative
report, when the fee shall be $15 per report. (b) The fee for copies of records not
otherwise provided for herein shall be the actual copying costs, which is the
average unit cost for copying such record, excluding fixed costs. (c) Unless otherwise prescribed by statute, there shall be no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of records; (2)
for records; or
(3)
any
certification pursuant to this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
483.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
